channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Santa Claus rally is good to go following inflation report
Nasdaq Composite breaks 20,000 for first time in intraday trading
Biden adviser says incomes up more than prices in reacting to CPI
Billionaire hedge fund exec and Mets owner Steve Cohen never wanted to stop working as a young trader: ‘I couldn’t wait for Mondays. I hated my weekends.’
item.description: The best traders are just like the best baseball players: "They can't wait to work, even in the offseason."

item.title: How Rocket Companies’ first-ever CTO is deploying AI aimed at making home buying easier
item.description: He's focusing attention on technologies that can automate a lot of the processes of buying a home.

item.title: Albertsons gives up on $24.6 billion Kroger merger and instead sues the chain for not doing enough to get deal approved
item.description: The move came the day after two judges halted the merger in separate court cases.

item.title: These 10 most-loved S&P 500 stocks could see as much as 50% upside in 2025
5 great tech gift idea choices for this holiday season
item.description: Gadgets are one of the most popular gift categories.

item.title: Elon Musk’s net worth tops $400 billion, a historic first
item.description: The most recent catalyst was an insider share sale of his privately held SpaceX, which boosted Musk’s net worth by roughly $50 billion in one fell swo...

item.title: One inflation measure shows prices heading the wrong way
